resources.string:
Memory Lame version 1.0. Limegreen Software.

 Keep app updated for improvements.

 Coming soon, paid version with no ads and more levels.

How lame is your memory? 

Turn the cards two at a time, and memorize the colours before they turn back around. Matching cards will remain facing up. Mismatching cards will turn back over. A point will be deducted if a mismatching pair contain a card previously revealed. 

The aim of the game is to finish all levels with a score of 0. Good luck!
